property.value: Kirsten Zirngibl

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ringed by white stone, Terisia was a city of scholarship and knowledge, where magic promised a brighter future to a world devoured by artifice." - The Antiquities War

property.name: Artist
property.value: Irina Nordsol

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These glyphs describe a Thran device capable of controlling a machine army, but the dimensions make no sense. It's nearly the size of the Null Moon." - Urza, diary

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ben Hill

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Measure the angles carefully. Note the gauge of the paper. By your sixth birthday, I expect a flying prototype." - Tawnos, letter to Harbin

property.name: Artist
property.value: Hiro Izawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The new prototype utilizing a rotational axis is marvelously effective: it makes me want to tear my own ears off." - Ashnod, to her assistants

property.name: Artist
property.value: Warren Mahy

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn. Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Presented to the Chief Artificer in recognition of his unparalleled service to Yotia." - Rusted plaque

property.name: Artist
property.value: Sean Murray

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've had a breakthrough on the fifth iteration. The subject's skin was entirely replaced within an hour, and he survived a full day after that!" - Ashnod, to Mishra

property.name: Artist
property.value: Johann Bodin

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Progress update: the problem of the slagheap blocking the entrance seems to have solved itself." - Mine supervisor's report

property.name: Artist
property.value: Chris Rahn

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Scry 1. {2}, {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Draw a card. When there are four or more page counters on Mazemind Tome, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Randy Gallegos

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller mills a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I now believe the strange orb was some kind of Thran security device. Supporting this theory, I can no longer recall where I found it." - Tocasia, journal entry

property.name: Artist
property.value: David Martin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the lean months, communities lived off a bitterwheat berry so tough that its flour contained more millstone than grain." - On the Early History of Keld

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yeong-Hao Han

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I sit and I think of Lat-Nam, of the azure waves white with froth, suspended over the shore. I see the energy there and I call it here." - Hurkyl, meditation notes

property.name: Artist
property.value: Warren Mahy

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secrets of my great-uncle's heirloom lie in the world where it was forged: the grease-stained wastes of Phyrexia." - Jarsyl, diary

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zack Stella

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Artifact

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A crystallized moment in time from the Mending Era, first discovered during the Ice Age. A temporal conundrum, even to the great scholar himself." - The Discoveries of Feldon

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steven Belledin

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library. {T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Titus Lunter

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without Urza's ingenuity, the wings would never have borne weight. Without Mishra's courage, we would never have known the machine's true potential. I hope this persuades them to work together more." - Tocasia, journal entry

property.name: Artist
property.value: Franz Vohwinkel

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}, Exile Perilous Vault: Exile all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the years passed, Urza turned his focus from the Thran to worlds beyond his own, seeking any spell or technology that might break the Phyrexian scourge." - Urza: From Prodigy to Planeswalker

property.name: Artist
property.value: David Astruga

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. {4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dave Kendall

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Phyrexian Horror

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These skittering creatures were created to hunt the one true threat to Phyrexia: dissent." - Venser, journal

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yeong-Hao Han

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serra built angels from the spirits of fallen warriors, but I believe a more mundane power source might suffice." - Karn

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ovidio Cartagena

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Precursor Golem enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lars Grant-West

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A rakalite core paired with a powerstone matrix has significantly increased the healing effects of my original amulet design." - Urza, research notes

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matt Cavotta

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Phyrexian Horror

property.name: Rules
property.value: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Perhaps drawing the impossible monster will lessen the burden my memory must bear." - Jarsyl, diary

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If powerstones are energy stored in material form, could we store matter as energy in the same way?" - Rayne, research notes

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ben Hill

property.name: Rules
Artist
property.value: David Astruga

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Artifact Creature

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors. Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Joseph Meehan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Harmonic resonance infusions amplify the natural abilities of the song mages of Sumifa." - Drafna, research notes

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Avon

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Based on his early work with primal clay, Tawnos refined the rare metals in the earth into self-assembling strands." - After the War

property.name: Artist
property.value: Heather Hudson

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Test 37: Sentience module is still too strong. It's adding ears again." - Development log of Willa, Yotian artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand. Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forges consumed all and still screamed for more." - The Antiquities War

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dan Scott

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This war will be over quickly, so we can afford to make the medals out of gold." - Dispatch from the Merchant Council of Korlis

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dan Scott

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Soul-Guide Lantern enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Exile each opponent's graveyard. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Draw a card.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lars Grant-West

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is neither the species of leaf nor the thickness of branch that creates music. Gaea's song is already in the drum." - Gamelen, Citanul elder

property.value: Jakub Kasper

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Untap Staff of Domination. {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life. {3}, {T}: Untap target creature. {4}, {T}: Tap target creature. {5}, {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give the schematic to the younger brother. Tell him that it will surely keep Argoth's resources out of Urza's hands." - Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

property.value: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

property.value: "Test 12: Boots now protect wearer from all hazards except blisters. Need to source better insoles." - Development log of Willa, Yotian artificer

property.value: Franz Vohwinkel

property.value: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.value: "The geode must be mined in moonlight and broken open by a silver hammer." - Tome of Obstructions

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heat from the rotating mechanism is captured and converted into energy, allowing it to operate in perpetuity." - Rusko's Compendium of Clockwork

property.name: Artist
property.value: David Astruga

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A wish can be controlled. Dreams are far more chaotic, and ungoverned by rationale." - Hurkyl's Metaphysics, vol. II
